biological_findings.taxa_relevance: Rationale: 18S rRNA is universal eukaryotic marker
biological_findings.marker_suitability: Sensitivity: High for protists, moderate for metazoans; Specificity: High phylogenetic signal
biological_findings.deep_sea_coverage: Deep-sea suitability: Good - best available option

biological_findings.taxa_relevance: Rationale: 28S provides complementary phylogenetic information
biological_findings.marker_suitability: Sensitivity: Moderate - fewer sequences available; Specificity: High for higher-level taxonomy
biological_findings.deep_sea_coverage: Deep-sea suitability: Moderate - good for placement

biological_findings.taxa_relevance: Rationale: ITS provides species-level resolution
biological_findings.marker_suitability: Sensitivity: Low - limited taxa with ITS; Specificity: Very high for fungi and some protists
biological_findings.deep_sea_coverage: Deep-sea suitability: Poor - limited deep-sea representation

biological_findings.taxa_relevance: Rationale: Broad coverage for unassigned sequences
biological_findings.marker_suitability: Sensitivity: Very high - all available sequences; Specificity: Variable - mixed markers
biological_findings.deep_sea_coverage: Deep-sea suitability: Low-Medium - needle in haystack

biological_findings.taxa_relevance: Balances sensitivity, specificity, and computational efficiency
biological_findings.marker_suitability: Uses marker-specific databases in order of phylogenetic resolution
biological_findings.deep_sea_coverage: Addresses deep-sea representation gaps with phylogenetic methods
